content: the next row this is what shapes the curve of the heel turn heel turn the heel turn continues only with the stitches on n3 row 1 rs k 16 19 21 ssk k1 turn work row 2 ws s1 purl wise p 5 7 7 p2tog p1 turn work row 3 rs s1 knit wise k to one stitch before the gap created when your work was turned on the previous row ssk k1 turn work row 4 ws s1 purl wise p to one stitch before the gap p2tog p1 turn work repeat row 3 and row 4 until you have worked all the stitches you will have 16 20 22 stitches left on your needle and you will end with a purl row turn your work and knit across the heel flap n3 placing a stitch marker after 8 10 11 stitches which is the halfway point now you re ready to start the heel gusset heel gusset at this point you ll continue working in the round again with rs of n3 facing you pick up and knit 14 16 18 stitches from along the side of the heel flap onto n3 pick up 1 extra stitch at the corner of the instep to eliminate having a small gap in the corner you should now have a total of 31 37 41 stitches on n3 continue knitting the k3 p1 rib pattern like you did for the leg of the sock across n1 and n2 remember this is the front of the sock or the instep now you will need the extra needle that you put aside using this needle pick up 1 stitch in the corner of the instep and then pick up 14 16 18 stitches along the other edge of the heel flap continue knitting 8 10 11 stitches to the marker from old n3 now n4 remove marker this is now n3 using a separate needle knit across n4 you should now have the following number of stitches on each needle n1 14 16 18 n2 14 16 18 n3 23 27 30 n4 23 27 30 4 © the kitchen sink shop heel decrease round 1 continue with the k3 p1 pattern on n1 and n2 instep needles for n3 k1 ssk k to end that is to say continue with stockinette on n3 and n4 for n4 k to 3 stitches from the end k2tog k1 round 2 continue with k3 p1 pattern on n1 and n2 instep needles knit all stitches on n3 and n4 round 3 continue with k3 p1 pattern on n1 and n2 instep needles for n3 k1 ssk k to end for n4 k to 3 stitches from the end k2tog k1 round 4 continue with k3 p1 pattern on n1 and n2 instep needles knit all stitches on n3 and n4 repeat rounds 1 to 4 to decrease the gusset until you have a total of 56 64 72 stitches or 14 16 18
